body_html:
@jiazhe0909 I've posted simple example and there's no processing at all, besides

ds = tf.data.Dataset.from_tensor_slices((x, y))
ds = ds.repeat()
ds = ds.batch(1024)

If it causes intensive CPU processing, there's an issue in tf.data.Dataset, but I'd like to get some feedback from the team.

ds = tf.data.Dataset.from_tensor_slices((x, y))

If it causes intensive CPU processing, there's an issue in tf.data.Dataset, but I'd like to get some feedback from the team.
body:
@jiazhe0909 I've posted simple example and there's no processing at all, besides 
```
ds = tf.data.Dataset.from_tensor_slices((x, y))
ds = ds.repeat()
ds = ds.batch(1024)
```
If it causes intensive CPU processing, there's an issue in `tf.data.Dataset`, but I'd like to get some feedback from the team.
